titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE (INITIAL) - Description

body.p: LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE (INITIAL) is the same as attribute LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE .
LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE (INITIAL) is the initial LEARNING DISABILITIES CARE CLUSTER CODE allocated by the CARE PROFESSIONAL .

p.b: Note: This data item is included in the Mental Health Services Data Set , but should not be submitted until further development by NHS Digital has been undertaken.
